channel.title: How Do You Create Pvp Areas?
channel.description:
Hi, I'm IAsk. I'm wondering if anyone could help me, I need to know how you add Pvp areas to your server. I was wondering if someone could tell me how you do it, Step by step. If someone could post the code to make [u]varrock east bank[/u] a Pvp area, i'm sure i could figure out how to change the area about.
Thankyou.

item.title: How Do You Create Pvp Areas?
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

I’m quite good at coding, I could probably work it out if i looked through my client a bit more.
But you know boys,
Lazy,
But proud.
If someone could still post the code though,
I would be gratefull.

Thankyou.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Create Pvp Areas?

item.title: How Do You Create Pvp Areas?
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

theres alot of coding involved… you have to edit a few voids, including magiconplayer and inWilderness and some basic melee stuf… its not for a first time poster… you either have to find a tutorial on it or just give up on it for a while.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Create Pvp Areas?
